nexoclom2.particle_tracking.compute_accel
=========================================

.. py:module:: nexoclom2.particle_tracking.compute_accel


Functions

.. autoapisummary::

   nexoclom2.particle_tracking.compute_accel.compute_accel


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: compute_accel(packets, output)

   
   Compute acceleration due to gravity and radiation pressure


   :Parameters:

       **packets: nexoclom2 Packets object**
           ..

       **output: nexoclom2 Output object**
           ..



   :Returns:

       Numpy array with 3 components of the acceleration.
           ..







   .. seealso::


       :obj:`nexoclom2.particle_tracking.packets.Packets`
           ..
       :obj:`nexoclom2.particle_tracking.Output.Output`
           ..
